SEARCH
Package smarthome.service.impl

Class DeviceServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
smarthome.service.impl.DeviceServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDeviceService
@Service public class DeviceServiceImpl extends Object implements IDeviceService
This class implements the IDeviceService interface and provides services related to devices in a smart home system. It manages operations such as adding a device to a room, retrieving devices in a room, deactivating a device, and retrieving devices grouped by sensor type.
